snippet: An American official said  a short suspension of the Iranian program would give negotiators time to pursue a comprehensive and far more challenging agreement.
lead_paragraph: An American official said  a short suspension of the Iranian program would give negotiators time to pursue a comprehensive and far more challenging agreement.

headline.main: U.S. Signals Flexibility as Iran Nuclear Talks Resume
headline.print_headline: U.S. Signals Flexibility as Iran Nuclear Talks Resume
